title: Change Server
body: I want to change the server from EUW to EUNE, but i can't buy the changer. What can i do?{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

replies.body: Account transfers are still down while they get them fixed up. [**HollyMonster **](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/rlu6awv4-transfer-service-update) was giving updates on the progress, and it seems like the last update mentioned needing another 5-6 weeks.
